description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useTodosPage' that manages the state and behavior for a to-do list page, including loading data, managing UI dialogs, handling user actions like add, edit, delete, toggle completion, and bulk operations, and interfacing with external API and context providers.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches to-do items from the API based on current filters and sorting options, updating the state accordingly.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Opens the 'edit to-do' dialog for the selected to-do item.

methods.name: requestDelete
methods.description: Initiates the delete confirmation process for a specific to-do item.

methods.name: submitAdd
methods.description: Creates a new to-do item via API and updates the state.

methods.name: submitEdit
methods.description: Updates an existing to-do item via API and updates the state.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Deletes the pending to-do item via API and updates the state.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a to-do item.

methods.name: doBulk
methods.description: Performs a bulk action on selected to-do items.

methods.name: setFilters
methods.description: Updates the filter criteria for loading to-do items.

methods.name: setSort
methods.description: Sets the sorting options for the list.
